p: To confirm that this clinical study is being safely and adequately conducted according to the study protocol and relevant regulations, and that data reliability is sufficiently secured, hospital visit monitoring with direct reading, including the comparison of case reports with original materials by the monitoring director or persons in charge of monitoring, will be performed. The principle investigator/investigators must accept hospital visit monitoring by the monitoring director and persons in charge of monitoring designated before the start of this study, and provide all study-associated records, such as original materials, for direct reading.
